subject: Script Function Execution Appends .0 to  parameter value=0
msgSnippet: HttpUnit 1.6 also appends .0 like 0.0 to 0 values when scripts are submitted and parameters passed from inside the function contain 0.0 instead of 0 causing
messageBody:
HttpUnit 1.6 also appends .0 like 0.0 to 0 values when scripts are
submitted and parameters passed from inside the function contain 0.0
instead of 0 causing error as internal HTtp error. Any Solution?
